com.sony.remotecontrol.ir
Enum DeviceCategory

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<DeviceCategory>
      com.sony.remotecontrol.ir.DeviceCategory
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<DeviceCategory>
public enum DeviceCategory
extends java.lang.Enum<DeviceCategory>

This is a list of constants used to identify various Device Categories controlled by IrRemote API.
